about_the_game:
* Tilt Five AR system required *

Discover 2 brand new digital SmartGames demo’s for the amazing Tilt Five AR system! These demo games are for 2 players, there is one head-to-head and one co-op game for you to enjoy. If you like these demo’s, show us your support and we will turn them into full games!

1. Rat Raze

In this crazy sliding race game 2 players compete to cross the finish line first. Each player slides the puzzle pieces in the right sequence, the arrows dictate the direction the car will go.

Use your Tilt Five wand's joystick to slide the pieces on the gameboard.

Then pull the joystick’s trigger to start your car and race to the finish.


This game is all about speed. Be fast and race your car over the finish line first to win!
This free demo version of Rat Raze comes with 8 different courses.

2. Road to Riches

In this co-op game 2 players work together to build islands and roads so the pirate can find all the treasures.
Players take turns to place a piece and build a path. Not all treasures are visible to both players!
Communication between players is key as you try to find & build roads between all treasure chests.

Guide the pirate to every treasure chest you can find!

Cooperate with your partner to find the location of every chest.

To place a road, point your Tilt Five wand and pull the trigger. The pirate is smart and will automatically walk when roads are built. No time to waste to get these chests!

But beware, you have a limited number of pieces!

Players must also avoid disturbing the kraken, it will steal every tile placed on top of it.
This demo version of Road to Riches comes with 6 levels.

If you like our games, show us your support!

name: Rat Raze / Road to Riches - Tilt Five

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4130 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 560Ti or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: 2 Tilt Five™ glasses, 2 Tilt Five™ wands and a Tilt Five™ gameboard

short_description: Discover 2 brand new SmartGames for Tilt Five™! Outsmart your opponent and race across the finish line first in Rat Raze or work together to reach the treasure in Road to Riches
